messages.content: Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Track a ticket number 3. Checking system status 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
4. List commonly recurring issues

Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. You have chosen to list commonly recurring issues. Some common issues with the Public Billing System include login errors, payment processing delays, and issues with patient data. If you would like to report an issue or have further questions, please let me know. Alternatively, you can dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Track a ticket number 3. Checking system status 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
1. Report an issue with PBS

Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. You have chosen to report an issue with the system. Please describe the issue you are experiencing with PBS. If you need assistance, you can also dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com
i'm having trouble with upos

Based on the information available, it appears that there have been previous incidents related to UPOS integration issues at Tan Tock Seng Hospital, including incidents where the UPOS command bridge was not set up for workstations at ED Counter 10. These incidents have been resolved, but it's possible that a similar issue is occurring. I recommend checking the current system status and reporting the issue if it's still occurring.

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Track a ticket number 3. Checking system status 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
i cant see the patient info in PBS

Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Track a ticket number 3. Check system performance 4. List commonly recurring issues. If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com. Please choose one of the options to proceed with your query about patient info in PBS.

You've chosen to Report an issue with the system. Please describe the issue you're experiencing with the Public Billing System (PBS), and I'll do my best to assist you. If you need help, you can also dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com
what is the resolution?

The resolution for the issue of patient info not visible in PBS is that the root cause was identified as a resource exhaustion issue on one of the shared database clusters that supports multiple NBS applications. A spike in background job executions, triggered by a misconfigured report scheduler, led to unusually high CPU and I/O usage during peak working hours. System performance has returned to normal.

1. Report an issue with PBS

Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. You have chosen to report an issue with the system. Please describe the issue you are experiencing with PBS. If you need assistance, you can also dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com
trouble logging in

It seems that you are having trouble logging in. A similar issue was previously reported where a user's account was locked after too many attempts, and the resolution was to contact the Ops team to unlock the account. You can try contacting them at exampleOpsForPBS@email.com to see if they can assist you with unlocking your account. If you need further assistance, you can also dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com
doesn't help

A similar incident was found where a user's account was locked after too many attempts, and the resolution was to contact the Ops team to unlock the account. 3. Checking system status

The current system status is Normal, and it was last updated at Fri Feb  6 12:01:45 2026. If you're still having trouble logging in, I can try to help you report an issue with the system. Please let me know if you'd like to proceed with that.

Good Afternoon! Welcome to the Go-Live Public Billing System support chatbot. Below are some prompts to start the conversation. 1. Report an issue with PBS 2. Track a ticket number 3. Checking system status 4. List commonly recurring issues If you want to speak to an agent, please dial our hotline 1234 5678. Alternatively, you can email us at example@email.com
2. Track a ticket number

The ticket number you provided does not exist in our records. Please ensure you have entered a valid ticket number starting with 'IN'. If you need further assistance, you can dial our hotline 1234 5678 or email us at example@email.com
The incident number IN6651503 is related to an issue with the card machine (UPOS) not triggering after a click, with a priority of 2.0, and it was closed on July 22, 2025, at 12:02 AM.
